name: .PM4 File Extension
summary: Learn about .PM4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Page layout document created by Adobe PageMaker 4; may include formatted text and images and multiple pages; used for created brochures, flyers, and other specially-formatted documents.

content: NOTE: PM4 files can be opened by Adobe PageMaker 4.0 and later. They can be converted to .PMD files with PageMaker 7.0, which can be opened with Adobe InDesign.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
